name: Amidst the Sky
description:
Embark on a mysterious journey through a land floating high up in the sky. Swim through clouds, soar along wind currents at great speed and jump over floating rocks as you explore the massive, abandoned world.

Explore and discover the ancient ruins hidden among the clouds. What secrets could these long-forgotten relics of the past hold?


CONTROLS
- Arrow keys/WASD: Move/jump/interact
- P: Pause game
- M: Mute sound
- R: Restart from latest checkpoint
- Shift/K: Unlockable item 1 (G and V also work)
- C/J/ALT: Unlockable item 2 (F and CTRL also work)
